'''Alpha v1.0.13'''<ref>{{ytl|I2sHIZd56Aw|<nowiki>[Minecraft]</nowiki> Lava and Water Meet!|iobuffa|July 29, 2010}}</ref> is a version of [[Java Edition Alpha]] released on July 28, 2010,<ref>[[wordofnotch:871255678|Minecraft Alpha 1.0.13]] – The Word of Notch, July 28, 2010</ref> to fix bugs and implement more work toward [[multiplayer]] functionality.

== Additions ==
=== General ===
'''[[Splash]]'''
* Re-added all splashes
* Added new splashes:
** Flaxkikare!
** Jason! Jason! Jason!

** Autonomous!

== Changes ==
=== Mobs ===
'''[[File:Slime JE2 BE1.png|32px]] [[Slime]]s'''
* Texture and model changed from [[File:Slime JE1.png|32px]].

=== Gameplay ===
'''[[Multiplayer]]'''
* There is progress.{{more info}}

=== General ===
'''General'''
* The client now checks if two instances of the game try to save to the same level, and quits if it does.
** This is accomplished using a <code>session.lock</code> file.
* The player's arm no longer gets stuck if {{key|F5}} is disabled while moving, as well as holding an item.
** As a result, the arm no longer has the idle animation when the inventory is shown.

== Fixes ==
'''1 bug fixed'''
* Fixed a crash related to lighting.</onlyinclude>
